tool_description: AI content detection remover and recreate method by Smodin. Our recreate method is the most powerful rewriter on the market. Our AI content detection removal is also one of the most powerful on the market, working in over 100 languages.

api_list.name: AI Detection Removal and Recreate Endpoint
api_list.description: This endpoint accepts text up to 12,000 characters and allows for language specification using a two-character encoding. It can also auto-detect the language. The recreateType parameter includes options for 'aiDetection' (default) and 'unique', with an experimental option available upon request.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text to be processed for AI detection removal.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language of the text, specified as a two-character code or 'auto' for auto-detection.

required_parameters.name: recreateType
required_parameters.description: The type of recreation to perform, options include 'aiDetection' and 'unique'.
